short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension detects him and replaces his picture with no more him icon.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: I developed this extension for those of you out there like me who his face reminds you of his bad ideas and ideology, the way he addresses people, the way he discriminates human race, and so on. And you do not like to see him on every single day when you open any news pages with your browser.
